name: Passage of Time
description:
Keep away the passage of time by replenishing the clock. But don't forget to barricade the doors, or it will get in.

Controls

[A] & [D] or [left] & [right] to move

[D]  or [down] to interact

[left shift] or [right control] to sprint

Objectives
  1. Collect raw materials (triangles and circles)
  2. Refine the materials (-> squares and Xs)
  3. Repair the doors and replenish the clock.

Survive for as long as you can, but know that time is inevitable. 

My high score is 491.09 seconds, see if you can beat it!

Details

Created for the BenBonk Game Jam #4 (November 2022)

Theme: Keep it away - keep away the passage of time

Limitation: Only 4 colors - one color per season, warns of the limited time you have left.

Credits

Music: Kevin MacLeod

"Ancient Rite," "Ethereal Relaxation," "Morgana Rides," "Aquarium," "SCP-x6x," & "Angel Share"

Font: Morris Roman by Dieter Steffmann 

Player sprite based on Kenny's creature generator
